text: La Nuestra Tierra (Our land) was a weekly newspaper edited by the IDEL (Leonese Studies Institute) between 2000 and 2004. Its content was mainly about Leonese territory and a 30% of it was written in Leonese language, from opinion articles to information in Leonese language. This publication edited 162 numbers, and was supported by the European Union and the Leonese public administrations. Category:Leonese language Category:Newspapers in Europe
title: La Nuestra Tierra
